synopsis.text: Contest-winning creation by Tatsuki in 2012, transformed into a captivating TV anime series in 2019, presents a thrilling science-fiction narrative centered around courageous girls battling bizarre creatures known as 'mushi' or 'bugs.' Produced by Tatsuki's independent animation group, Irodori, and Yaoyorozu, this action-packed tale unfolds in a post-apocalyptic world shrouded in an eerie red fog. Originally a triumphant entry in the '24th 3D Anime Contest,' the story chronicles the girls' relentless struggle for survival against these enigmatic entities, promising an enthralling and suspenseful journey for viewers.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
